cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.SI, cs.DS

Reasoning: The paper discusses updating measures of uncertainty in various frameworks, including evidence theory, possibility theory, and epistemic states. These topics are closely related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG), as well as information theory (cs.IT) and signal processing (cs.SI). Additionally, the paper discusses the combination of ordinal conditional functions, which is a topic in data science (cs.DS).
